title: Driving the Circular economy: Role of AI and emerging technologies
description: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing waste management. AI-powered robots sort waste with high accuracy, improving recycling. Predictive systems optimize collection routes, reducing emissions. Smart bins alert services for timely pickups.
content:
The fourth revolution is here, and it is a technology-led wave of change. A shift in how we understand and live life, how data and digitization have changed the working world, the economy, politics, geopolitics, as well as our day-to-day life.

title: 18-yr-old graphic designer held for theft; claims AI took his job
description: An 18-year-old graphic designer, who claimed to have lost his job due to AI artificial intelligence, has been arrested with his doctor-aspirant woman friend for allegedly stealing jewellery worth Rs 16 lakh, police said.The teen duo told police that they were inspired by the 2005 film Bunty Aur Babli, said Deputy Commissioner of Police DCP Shrikrishna Lalchandani on Thursday.
content:

title: Smart manufacturing moves beyond Industry 4.0, forcing a rethink of industrial strategy
description: Manufacturing technologies have been the first domain to experience this transformation. The review documents how artificial intelligence and machine learning have overtaken conventional statistical approaches in process optimization. Data-driven models now capture complex, nonlinear relationships between process parameters and output quality, enabling manufacturers to balance competing objectives such as surface quality, productivity, energy consumption, and defect reduction.
content: Manufacturing is moving deeper into the era of intelligent systems. What was once defined by automation and efficiency is now evolving into a complex ecosystem where production, energy use, human oversight, and environmental performance are tightly i... [7555 chars]

title: Japan to Quadruple Spending Support for Chips, AI in Budget
description: Japan’s industry ministry is set to nearly quadruple its budgeted support for cutting-edge semiconductors and artificial intelligence development to about ¥1.23 trillion ($7.9 billion) for the fiscal year starting in April.

title: Human Race Must Never Give in to AI or Governments
description: Despite AI's growth, humans remain vital. Learn how understanding our cognition benefits our performance alongside artificial intelligence.
content:
AI is a new tool for government elites’ coercion. The rest of us will struggle, but we will prevail and grow freer.
To remain competitive, humans must show up.
